Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:24:24

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1FYLC2_00
From: dewa@dewa.gov.ae <dewa@dewa.gov.ae>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-23 13:06
Subject: Request for Supply Reconnection Query
--------------------------------------------------


Dear Customer,

Thank you for requesting (Supply Reconnection Query), your reference number is 102755488, your request will be completed within 3 working days. 






 <https://www.dewa.gov.ae/emailer/greenbill/images/dewa_footer_en.bmp>
